1111317840865435648.text: It's evidence of a LOT more than those things. #antiscience #antiauthority #InternetCulturehttps://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111333373040041984.text: In your experience, are some of the flat-earthers doing it for internet notoriety (trolling), to some degree?

1111378570893389825.text: There's an antisemitic element as well, citing an international conspiracy of wealth Jewish people. Charming.

1111334173086793728.text: Sure. A few. They do like attention but it's not satire like it had been by some in the past. The antiauthority sentiment is the most obvious to me. Fits with today's widespread conspiracism and institutional distrust.
